member.name: M:SacredSelections.HashSaltFactory.CreateSalt
member.summary: Method generates and returns a random salt value. Salt value is added to a string before hashing to increase security.

member.name: T:SacredSelections.HashSaltFactory
member.summary: Creates a hash from a string input.
member.remarks: This class is a one-way encryption method. The value it returns cannot be decrypted, because a random salt value is added to increase security.
